entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and one of Harry's best friends. He is sharing his story about the events that happened down in the lake with everyone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and Ron's best friend. His limelight is shared by Ron for once.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who put all the hostages into a bewitched sleep in Professor McGonagall's office.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall has an office where Dumbledore put the hostages to sleep.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and one of Harry's best friends. Her story about the events that happened down in the lake tallies with Ron's initial version.

entities.name: padma
entities.description: Padma is someone who is listening to Ron's story.

entities.name: merpeople
entities.description: Merpole people who are heavily armed and kidnap Ron.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are best friends.
Dumbledore has authority over McGonagall's office where he put the hostages to sleep.
